name: Chat Orders for WooCommerce
author: Shehab Mahamud

sections.description:
Introducing “Chat Orders for WooCommerce ,” the ultimate solution for seamless customer interactions and effortless ordering. With this innovative plugin, customers can now place orders directly through WhatsApp, streamlining the purchasing process like never before.

Plugin Documentation: https://wordpress.org/plugins/chat-orders-for-woocommerce/

sections.installation:
1. Upload chat-orders-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go Settings page and click words count to set words count option and characters option also reading time option.
sections.faq:
Do I need to setup anything?

No.But if you want to show the post statistics into post page then go the setting page and click word count to set extra features .= What do i need to start ? =

You just need a phone number and WhatsApp account
